what_you_do: Spiritual coaches help people live a more fulfilling, embodied, and balanced life. They combine soulful guidance and healing practices with coaching methodology.
who_you_serve: People looking to achieve greater peace, develop a stronger intuition, and manifest their biggest desires.
social_proof: Some coaches have been featured in publications like Forbes and The New York Times, and have large social media followings.
signature_programs: Programs like Awakening Your Spirit Mind, Diamond Feng Shui, Diamond Dowsing, and Inner Diamond Meditation.
business_focus: Helping people live more fulfilling, embodied, and balanced lives through spiritual coaching.
service_provided: Spiritual guidance, energy healing, meditation, manifestation, intuition development
